titleStmt.title: The Description of the castle of entertainment as also the wonderful increase of the race of the Huffs : together with a relation of their first original as it was attested by Old Mother Huff in strange characters, and since discover'd and copied out by a pilgrim in the year 1668.

notesStmt.note: Imprint suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
